themes.description: Users frequently report app crashes, lags, freezing, and order execution failures, often leading to significant financial losses due to these technical problems.
Many users complain about excessively high brokerage, commission, and other hidden charges, especially for small investments or specific transactions.
Users express frustration over unresponsive customer service, lack of replies, automated responses, and difficulty resolving account or technical issues.
This theme covers complaints about missing essential features, outdated user interface design, poor chart functionality, and general usability issues.
